content.raw:
There is good bunch of code but I really appreciate all the tests looking for the full coverage. Yay!
I'm not able to make the tests to fail in my Linux raring system with the following dependencies:
```
--   found robot_msgs, version 0.1.0
--   found libzmq, version 4.0.4
--   found libczmq, version 2.2.1
--   found uuid, version 2.20.0
```
Nice job, next time we should think the way of making it in different PRs so the motivation for reviewing won't be so hard.
